item.title: Budget Home Theather with a Headless Raspberry Pi and Flirc for Remote Controlling
item.description: Intro Hello folks. Today, I would like to tell you about my configuration for a low budget Home Theater setup. My tools are as follows: FLIRC Raspberry Pi 2 500G SSD An a good ‘ol wifi TL;DR Use Flirc for remote control, omxplayer for streaming the movie from an SSD on a headless PI controller via SSH and enjoy a nice, cold Lemon - Menta beer. Flirc First, the remote control.
